entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14 except minus 19 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14 except minus 19 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
